search.program: _path=="http" | cut id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, method, host, uri | uniq -c
filename!=null | cut _path, tx_hosts, rx_hosts, conn_uids, mime_type, filename, md5, sha1

items.name: Activity Overview
items.value: count() by _path | sort -r
items.description: Shows a list of all Zeek streams in the data set, with a count of associated records

items.name: Unique DNS Queries
items.value: _path=="dns" | count() by query | sort -r
items.description: Shows all unique DNS queries in the data set with count

items.name: Windows Networking Activity
items.value: _path matches smb* OR _path=="dce_rpc"
items.description: Filters and displays smb_files, smb_mapping and DCE_RPC activity

items.name: HTTP Requests
items.value: _path=="http" | cut id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, method, host, uri | uniq -c
items.description: Displays a list of the count of unique HTTP requests including source and destination

items.name: Unique Network Connections
items.value: _path=="conn" | cut id.orig_h, id.resp_p, id.resp_h | sort | uniq
items.description: Displays a table showing all unique source:port:destination connections pairings

items.name: Connection Received Data
items.value: _path=="conn" | put total_bytes := orig_bytes + resp_bytes | sort -r total_bytes | cut uid, id, orig_bytes, resp_bytes, total_bytes
items.description: Shows the connections between hosts, sorted by data received

items.name: File Activity
items.value: filename!=null | cut _path, tx_hosts, rx_hosts, conn_uids, mime_type, filename, md5, sha1
items.description: Displays a curated view of file data including md5 and sha1 for complete file transfers

items.name: HTTP Post Requests
items.value: method=="POST" | cut ts, uid, id, method, uri, status_code
items.description: Displays all HTTP Post requests including the URI and HTTP status code

items.name: Show IP Subnets
items.value: _path=="conn" | put classnet := network_of(id.resp_h) | cut classnet | count() by classnet | sort -r
items.description: Enumerates the classful networks for all destination IP addresses including count of connections

items.name: Suricata Alerts by Category
items.value: event_type=="alert" | count() by alert.severity,alert.category | sort count
items.description: Shows all Suricata alert counts by category and severity

items.name: Suricata Alerts by Source and Destination
items.value: event_type=="alert" | alerts := union(alert.category) by src_ip, dest_ip
items.description: Shows all Suricata alerts in a list by unique source and destination IP addresses

items.name: Suricata Alerts by Subnet
items.value: event_type=="alert" | alerts := union(alert.category) by network_of(dest_ip)
items.description: Displays a list of Suricata alerts by CIDR network

searchBar.current: _path=="http" | cut id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, method, host, uri | uniq -c
